Key Match Events: Chancel Mbemba scored a goal to equalize for D.R. Congo
Yoane Wissa scored a penalty to give D.R. Congo the lead
Arthur Masuaku scored a long-range free-kick to secure a 3-1 victory for D.R. Congo
Post-Match Reflections: Sebastien Desabre, the coach of D.R. Congo, expressed his satisfaction with the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Abidjan
Others: D.R. Congo advanced to the semi-finals of the Africa Cup of Nations
